content: It is impossible to say without more information about the specific situation and his background. People's emotional needs can vary greatly and can be influenced by many factors such as past experiences, childhood, personality, etc. It's best to communicate openly and directly with him to understand his needs and how you can best support him. However, keep in mind that ultimately individuals are responsible for their own emotional well-being and fulfillment, and it's not necessarily the sole responsibility of their partner to meet all their needs.
